name: maTrACA ESSA BOLA | Shout that ball
name_original: maTrACA ESSA BOLA | Shout that ball
description:
Fale "e acerte a cesta"!

Transmita energia sonora pela linha, transmitindo matéria (a bolinha) até a cesta através de seu microfone ou mouse/touchscreen. Faça quantos pontos conseguir!

O código-fonte do jogo está disponível no seguinte link: https://github.com/gilzoide/matraca-essa-bola

Speak "up and shoot that basket"!

Transmit energy through the line, transmitting matter (the ball) into the
basket using your microphone or mouse/touchscreen. Make as many points as you can!

The game's source code is available in the following link: https://github.com/gilzoide/matraca-essa-bola
